title: Some observations made upon the Molucco nutts, imported from the Indies shewing their admirable virtues in curing the collick, rupture, and all distempers proceeding from the wind. Written by a Doctor of Physick in the countrey, to Dr. Castle, one of the Royal Society in London
author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
notes: A Doctor of Physick in the country = John Peachi; also attributed to John Pechey.
Formerly identified in Wing (1st ed.) as: M1578.
Copy cataloged has MS. attribution "Pechey" on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
